channel.title: [317] Old School PKING [TESTING]
channel.description:
I'm currently looking for players to test out the combat in this pking server I have created from a blank Winterlove source. This server has nothing but pking until I add some skills into it. Right now basically you just login, gear up and start killing. This Server is 317 with 377 cache. I'm trying to bring fun pking back the old school way, so if you like this simple server for logging in pking your heart out with economy then please help me get good feedback![/COLOR]
[size=18pt][url=http://rs4fun2.webs.com/]http://rs4fun2.webs.com/[/url][/size]
Features: Working Soul Split Real Bonuses! Working Turmoil Working Vengeance Armadyl Godsword with spec Dragon Claws with spec All Dragon weapons with spec Food Timers Prayer Potions Shops
Commands: ::wild ::home ::brid ::master
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd6/Beau_Marshall/pic1-6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd6/Beau_Marshall/6.png[/img]
Just login the client and you can start pking!
[size=18pt][url=http://rs4fun2.webs.com/]http://rs4fun2.webs.com/[/url][/size]

item.title: [317] Old School PKING [TESTING]
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:7, topic:451367”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=554259.msg4060059#msg4060059 date=1343338195]
not really old school with soulspit & turmoil… Also why is veng is in ancient spellbook?
[/quote]
It isnt a good server really. The combat system allows you to do 50 and 30 with dds. xD I’m fixing it don’t worry (NO I AM NOT STAFF).[/quote]

Lol thats very kind of you to help him out without wanting anything in return

Read full topic
